name: xgovw-action
description: A GitHub action to run xgovw and display the results.

scripts.build: esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node16 --outfile=dist/index.js && shx cp node_modules/xgovw-lint-js/xgovw_lint_js_bg.wasm dist && echo { "type": "commonjs" } > dist/package.json
